original_text: Thine eyes did see my substance, yet being unperfect; and in thy book all my members were written, which in continuance were fashioned, when as yet there was none of them.
korean_text: 내 형질이 이루어지기 전에 주의 눈이 보셨으며 나를 위하여 정한 날이 하루도 되기 전에 주의 책에 다 기록이 되었나이다

sentences.original_text: Thine eyes did see my substance
and in thy book all my members were written
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 책에 나의 모든 지체가 기록되었고

sentences.original_text: when as yet there was none of them
sentences.korean_translation: 아직 그것들 중 어느 것도 없었을 때였습니다
